post.body:
Prior to this, the tech companies have taken a "frog boiling in water" approach. A ban and suspension here and there makes people upset for a day or so if they hear about it, but then they forget the next day and go right back to using Facebook or Twitter.

But today is different. The biggest thing, of course, was banning President Trump. Trump will now HAVE to use alt tech, and that will bring millions of people to which ever platform (s) he chooses.

What is happening now, is that the older, less computer savvy, and lazy people who just couldn't be bothered, are making the switch. Facebook groups are suddenly not just bitching about Facebook but are posting about their alternate groups on Parler and MeWe. I've already seen that in the past few weeks. And now even my mom is joining Parler. 

Speaking of Parler, Apple and Google already blew their load - they've banned Parler, so they can't do anything else to them at this point. I think this may result in some people finally learning how to install an APK. Once we get normies doing that, Google loses a lot of power, because people can say, "Fuck you, and fuck your Play Store too." 

Also, if they had just banned Trump, it might have been written off as a once off thing, blamed on Trump's perceived bad behaviour - just another ban, however more noticeable. But the fact that they are doing all of these other things simultaneously drives home the point that this is more of a purge. 

They aren't raising the temperature slow anymore; they are throwing the frog right in, and this time I believe the frog is going to jump out.

I think this is going to be just the kick in the ass people need to get moving.

body:
> You're really saying that Paul doesn't think men and women exist?

No, I'm saying he said it shouldn't be a matter of importance. Of course they exist, that's a fact.

> Even Paul spoke separately about how men and women should act.

No he didn't and I don't care how much "the church" spews propaganda that he was a crusader for Greco-Roman traditions. When you can't beat em, join em, and infiltrate them from the inside. And that's exactly what both the Romans and the unbelieving Jewish sects did. Paul was the exact opposite and that's one reason they hated him and other Christians so bad. For Paul, the world in its present form is passing away and such wordly systems are not profitable. Not that Paul is on equal authority to Jesus regardless, let alone *more* important like people seem to think.

> If you don't know what it is, then why do you so passionately disagree with this SBC document about it? My takeaway from it is that SBC also thinks it shouldn't be much of a thought.

Because the SBC didn't bring up the SJW attitude and hypocrisy and censorship and tantrums; it's not condemning that (I am not saying that the SBC does not condemn that, I mean this article in particular doesn't bring it up). It argued against the idea that there should be no discrimination (and note that discrimination can be equal). How can they be arguing it shouldn't be much of a thought when they strongly asserted that "distinctions" should be recognized? That's not very much of a not thinking about it attitude. This world is passing away, we should not be investing so much into a reality that's barely even real at all. And by the way, who is it that is the god of this world?

Because the SBC didn't bring up the SJW attitude and hypocrisy and censorship and tantrums; it's not condemning that (I am not saying that the SBC does not condemn that, I mean this article in particular doesn't bring it up). He who believes in Him is not judged; he who does not believe has been judged already, because he has not believed in the name of the only begotten Son of God. This is the judgment, that the Light has come into the world, and men loved the darkness rather than the Light, for their deeds were evil. For everyone who does evil hates the Light, and does not come to the Light for fear that his deeds will be exposed. But he who practices the truth comes to the Light, so that his deeds may be manifested as having been wrought in God."

May all personally encounter the presence and attention of the Lord God. 

Curiosity, questions, discussion, and prayer requests are welcome.

body:
The discord situation is that for the past few months the admins have secluded themselves to a select group of users who they are friends with on discord. They have several private channels and servers where they circlejerk, and they basically are the only people taken seriously by the admins now. I warned about this months ago when the admins were giving certain users on discord special treatment and extra privileges, but no one took me seriously. Since then the admins have spent much more time on discord than the site their discord is named after. And recently the admins have declared that they're "done" with the userbase and that everyone except their small little discord group is just "schizos" and "absolutists" (as if that's a bad thing) who deserves to be dismissed immediately. So now we have a small group of top users who are allowed to talk to the admins and give feedback and get more insider info, but no one else. [Which sounds quite familiar if you ask me](https://ruqqus.com/+The_Cabal). They're also making up excuses to ban users they don't like and letting members of that group get away with the exact same things.

Civil was a user a while back who got banned for threatening legal action, so everyone sieged their guilds. But that was far from the worst incident.

post.body:
RuqES is aiming at improving user experience of Ruqqus. For more details see [What is RuqES?](https://ruqqus.com/post/ldx/what-is-ruqes) or +RuqES. --- --- I will be taking a break from actively using Ruqqus (after I finish last Blender project). I may occasionally do some minor bug fixes in RuqES, but most likely I won't be adding any new features. See my explanation at the end. --- * Added new reaction gif ruqqie "giving crown". [image source](https://ruqqus.com/+Ruqqie/post/5xhz/ruqqie-reaction-gifs) * Implemented category change detection (applies all modifications to newly loaded posts). * Implemented experimental basic revealing of blocked comments (not enabled by default). `Main menu` 🠖 `RuqES` 🠖 `Comments` 🠖 `Reveal blocked comment button`
![](https://i.ibb.co/J7zjSSh/Peek-2021-01-03-18-17-ruqqes-reveal-blocked-comment.gif) * Implemented lazy loading of reaction gifs popup. * Increased time before isDarkTheme gives up. --- * Fixed error message in image upload and reaction gif failing on comments deleted by author. * Fixed multiple insertion of buttons (image upload and reaction gif) in direct post reply. * Added more error checks to reaction gifs and comment image upload. * Fixed reaction gif not being inserted in empty post for first time. --- If you are actively using saving of posts or comments, please, **backup your data regularly**!
`Main menu` 🠖 `RuqES` 🠖 `Settings` 🠖 `Export` --- (Rest is just my explanation why I am going silent/low-efford on Ruqqus. There is nothing more directly related to RuqES, feel free to scroll to comments if you aren't interested.) Reason of my decision is the bias of admins (selective rules enforcement, überusers from Discord and patrons) and repeated changes contrary to their own advertising ("without censorship", supporting free speech, admins being impartial, leaving as much as possible to community). Some of their failures were fixed (censoring uncategorized guilds, arbitrary bans for threats), others were not (forced categories). I dislike how unprofessionally are admins behaving - ignoring (or not even requesting) feedback from community, encouraging and participating in brigadding and trolling operations, banning people for criticism under the excuse of undefined harassment (this should be defined precisely and allowing as much as possible, same as happened to threats, or you are not a free speech platform; offended can use block) and banning (or at least threatening to ban) for off-platform behaviour (not on ruqqus.com). It looks like admins were even cooperating with a group on Discord, so that the group can steal guilds (siege with alts) within seconds after admins roll out rule changes. And using Discord instead of their own platform or at least a freespeech-supporting alternative (e.g. self-hosted Matrix), [I wrote a comment about that problem recently](https://ruqqus.com/+uslashremoved/post/695h/sfrohne-permanently-banned-for-linking-to/ly25) (but I mentioned it several times before, in a span of months, I wasn't the only one). I don't want another Reddit... I'll lurk for a while (meaning I'll stop posting and creating content, stop/limit writing of comments). Even though Ruqqus is getting worse for some time, maybe there is still a chance admins see the light. I will be trying [saidit](https://saidit.net) and possibly [poal](https://poal.co), maybe I'll see you there. To prevent any rumors and mischaracterization (since I saw it done in several instances before): * I am not a nazi (or any other extremist). I took several tests and *all* shown I am pretty much just a dirty average centrist (e.g. [this one](https://i.ibb.co/GkXhJzB/canvas.png)) * I am not a shill/paid to disrupt competition. I started using Ruqqus over half a year ago and since then I posted a lot of links to videos I found interesting, majority of them apolitical (rest were about gaming and negative effects brought by mixing politics in). I tried to grow few apolitical guilds (I believe that without much better category system [quick switching between sets of categories] or multireddits/aliances, it's almost impossible currently). I created few Ruqqus-inspired pieces in Blender (each taking 1-2 work days, e.g. a [wallpaper](https://ruqqus.com/+Ruqqus/post/21c5/ruqqus-wallpaper-oc) and some Ruqqies in +Ruqqie), and of course created and maintained this userscript (that's at least a hundred work hours, probably much more; maintaining it over 5 months I believe). * I am not a troll. I always tried to stay positive and polite (I like non-pc/dank/dark/edgy memes and don't mind vulgarities, but I don't use them). It was very strange to find myself in a same team (pro free speech, and against manipulation and other shenanigans of admins) as, I think, a literal nazi and a progressive... Sorry for this wall of text and my non-native English. I hope freedom of speech prevails - offline and online, if not here then at least on some other platform. See you, internet cowboys. ![](https://i.ibb.co/TvNKmDF/sad.gif)
post.body_html:
RuqES is aiming at improving user experience of Ruqqus. For more details see What is RuqES? or +RuqES.

I will be taking a break from actively using Ruqqus (after I finish last Blender project). I may occasionally do some minor bug fixes in RuqES, but most likely I won't be adding any new features. See my explanation at the end.

  • Added new reaction gif ruqqie "giving crown". image source
  • Implemented category change detection (applies all modifications to newly loaded posts).
  • Implemented experimental basic revealing of blocked comments (not enabled by default). Main menu 🠖 RuqES 🠖 Comments 🠖 Reveal blocked comment button
  • Implemented lazy loading of reaction gifs popup.
  • Increased time before isDarkTheme gives up.
  • Fixed error message in image upload and reaction gif failing on comments deleted by author.
  • Fixed multiple insertion of buttons (image upload and reaction gif) in direct post reply.
  • Added more error checks to reaction gifs and comment image upload.
  • Fixed reaction gif not being inserted in empty post for first time.

If you are actively using saving of posts or comments, please, backup your data regularly!
Main menu 🠖 RuqES 🠖 Settings 🠖 Export

(Rest is just my explanation why I am going silent/low-efford on Ruqqus. There is nothing more directly related to RuqES, feel free to scroll to comments if you aren't interested.)

Reason of my decision is the bias of admins (selective rules enforcement, überusers from Discord and patrons) and repeated changes contrary to their own advertising ("without censorship", supporting free speech, admins being impartial, leaving as much as possible to community). Some of their failures were fixed (censoring uncategorized guilds, arbitrary bans for threats), others were not (forced categories). I dislike how unprofessionally are admins behaving - ignoring (or not even requesting) feedback from community, encouraging and participating in brigadding and trolling operations, banning people for criticism under the excuse of undefined harassment (this should be defined precisely and allowing as much as possible, same as happened to threats, or you are not a free speech platform; offended can use block) and banning (or at least threatening to ban) for off-platform behaviour (not on ruqqus.com). It looks like admins were even cooperating with a group on Discord, so that the group can steal guilds (siege with alts) within seconds after admins roll out rule changes. And using Discord instead of their own platform or at least a freespeech-supporting alternative (e.g. self-hosted Matrix), I wrote a comment about that problem recently (but I mentioned it several times before, in a span of months, I wasn't the only one). I don't want another Reddit...

I'll lurk for a while (meaning I'll stop posting and creating content, stop/limit writing of comments). Even though Ruqqus is getting worse for some time, maybe there is still a chance admins see the light. I will be trying saidit and possibly poal, maybe I'll see you there.

To prevent any rumors and mischaracterization (since I saw it done in several instances before):

  • I am not a nazi (or any other extremist). I took several tests and all shown I am pretty much just a dirty average centrist (e.g. this one)
  • I am not a shill/paid to disrupt competition. I started using Ruqqus over half a year ago and since then I posted a lot of links to videos I found interesting, majority of them apolitical (rest were about gaming and negative effects brought by mixing politics in). I tried to grow few apolitical guilds (I believe that without much better category system [quick switching between sets of categories] or multireddits/aliances, it's almost impossible currently). I created few Ruqqus-inspired pieces in Blender (each taking 1-2 work days, e.g. a wallpaper and some Ruqqies in +Ruqqie), and of course created and maintained this userscript (that's at least a hundred work hours, probably much more; maintaining it over 5 months I believe).
  • I am not a troll. I always tried to stay positive and polite (I like non-pc/dank/dark/edgy memes and don't mind vulgarities, but I don't use them). It was very strange to find myself in a same team (pro free speech, and against manipulation and other shenanigans of admins) as, I think, a literal nazi and a progressive...

Sorry for this wall of text and my non-native English.

I hope freedom of speech prevails - offline and online, if not here then at least on some other platform.

See you, internet cowboys.

body:
> Just because we have a discord that's official doesn't mean it's a troll brigade.

There are other private exclusive servers that the admins are involved in, and also private channels in the main server

> Ask captainmeta4 why he told discord mods.

Because he basically gives them admin level privileges. It's exactly the same as DefaultMods on reddit.

> A mistake was made, and it won't be made again.

This was not the first time. We've got jason, firexq (discord only), civil, dgk, klenny, darkforge, xigbar68, josephgoebbels (reversed), sfrohne, and cap threatened to ban me for "harassment" all because I questioned the actions of the discord clique. Even though users like carpathianflorist tell everyone to kill themselves all day (jokingly of course, but that's definitely worse than a disagreement).

> After it was sent in the mod chat, it was immediately leaked to the cord, which in return prepared for the ban.

Why should it be sent in the mod chat? That means the mods can just immediately siege the guilds and no one else knows yet. I suspected the discord mods got told some extra insider info and I suppose I was right.
body_html:
Just because we have a discord that's official doesn't mean it's a troll brigade.

There are other private exclusive servers that the admins are involved in, and also private channels in the main server

Ask captainmeta4 why he told discord mods.

Because he basically gives them admin level privileges. It's exactly the same as DefaultMods on reddit.

A mistake was made, and it won't be made again.

This was not the first time. We've got jason, firexq (discord only), civil, dgk, klenny, darkforge, xigbar68, josephgoebbels (reversed), sfrohne, and cap threatened to ban me for "harassment" all because I questioned the actions of the discord clique. Even though users like carpathianflorist tell everyone to kill themselves all day (jokingly of course, but that's definitely worse than a disagreement).

After it was sent in the mod chat, it was immediately leaked to the cord, which in return prepared for the ban.

Why should it be sent in the mod chat? That means the mods can just immediately siege the guilds and no one else knows yet. I suspected the discord mods got told some extra insider info and I suppose I was right.

parent.body:
It was leaked immediately. There is no brigading rule on Ruqqus. 

>encouraging or even being a part of troll/briggade

What? Just because we have a discord that's official doesn't mean it's a troll brigade. There is no other side to the story, this is the truth. Ask captainmeta4 why he told discord mods. 

> Admins must be impartial,

They are. A mistake was made, and it won't be made again. They do not censor any views on this website, or comments, unless it is a violation of ToS, which is clearly laid out in the rules section and the regular ToS section.

edit: I also just talked to kek and he said that CM4 told discord mods just to be aware of any drama in the cord. After it was sent in the mod chat, it was immediately leaked to the cord, which in return prepared for the ban. 

![](https://i.imgur.com/7M8tTAa.png)

post.body:
RuqES is aiming at improving user experience of Ruqqus. For more details see [What is RuqES?](https://ruqqus.com/post/ldx/what-is-ruqes) or +RuqES. --- --- I will be taking a break from actively using Ruqqus (after I finish last Blender project). I may occasionally do some minor bug fixes in RuqES, but most likely I won't be adding any new features. See my explanation at the end. --- * Added new reaction gif ruqqie "giving crown". [image source](https://ruqqus.com/+Ruqqie/post/5xhz/ruqqie-reaction-gifs) * Implemented category change detection (applies all modifications to newly loaded posts). * Implemented experimental basic revealing of blocked comments (not enabled by default). `Main menu` 🠖 `RuqES` 🠖 `Comments` 🠖 `Reveal blocked comment button`
![](https://i.ibb.co/J7zjSSh/Peek-2021-01-03-18-17-ruqqes-reveal-blocked-comment.gif) * Implemented lazy loading of reaction gifs popup. * Increased time before isDarkTheme gives up. --- * Fixed error message in image upload and reaction gif failing on comments deleted by author. * Fixed multiple insertion of buttons (image upload and reaction gif) in direct post reply. * Added more error checks to reaction gifs and comment image upload. * Fixed reaction gif not being inserted in empty post for first time. --- If you are actively using saving of posts or comments, please, **backup your data regularly**!
`Main menu` 🠖 `RuqES` 🠖 `Settings` 🠖 `Export` --- (Rest is just my explanation why I am going silent/low-efford on Ruqqus. There is nothing more directly related to RuqES, feel free to scroll to comments if you aren't interested.) Reason of my decision is the bias of admins (selective rules enforcement, überusers from Discord and patrons) and repeated changes contrary to their own advertising ("without censorship", supporting free speech, admins being impartial, leaving as much as possible to community). Some of their failures were fixed (censoring uncategorized guilds, arbitrary bans for threats), others were not (forced categories). I dislike how unprofessionally are admins behaving - ignoring (or not even requesting) feedback from community, encouraging and participating in brigadding and trolling operations, banning people for criticism under the excuse of undefined harassment (this should be defined precisely and allowing as much as possible, same as happened to threats, or you are not a free speech platform; offended can use block) and banning (or at least threatening to ban) for off-platform behaviour (not on ruqqus.com). It looks like admins were even cooperating with a group on Discord, so that the group can steal guilds (siege with alts) within seconds after admins roll out rule changes. And using Discord instead of their own platform or at least a freespeech-supporting alternative (e.g. self-hosted Matrix), [I wrote a comment about that problem recently](https://ruqqus.com/+uslashremoved/post/695h/sfrohne-permanently-banned-for-linking-to/ly25) (but I mentioned it several times before, in a span of months, I wasn't the only one). I don't want another Reddit... I'll lurk for a while (meaning I'll stop posting and creating content, stop/limit writing of comments). Even though Ruqqus is getting worse for some time, maybe there is still a chance admins see the light. I will be trying [saidit](https://saidit.net) and possibly [poal](https://poal.co), maybe I'll see you there. To prevent any rumors and mischaracterization (since I saw it done in several instances before): * I am not a nazi (or any other extremist). I took several tests and *all* shown I am pretty much just a dirty average centrist (e.g. [this one](https://i.ibb.co/GkXhJzB/canvas.png)) * I am not a shill/paid to disrupt competition. I started using Ruqqus over half a year ago and since then I posted a lot of links to videos I found interesting, majority of them apolitical (rest were about gaming and negative effects brought by mixing politics in). I tried to grow few apolitical guilds (I believe that without much better category system [quick switching between sets of categories] or multireddits/aliances, it's almost impossible currently). I created few Ruqqus-inspired pieces in Blender (each taking 1-2 work days, e.g. a [wallpaper](https://ruqqus.com/+Ruqqus/post/21c5/ruqqus-wallpaper-oc) and some Ruqqies in +Ruqqie), and of course created and maintained this userscript (that's at least a hundred work hours, probably much more; maintaining it over 5 months I believe). * I am not a troll. I always tried to stay positive and polite (I like non-pc/dank/dark/edgy memes and don't mind vulgarities, but I don't use them). It was very strange to find myself in a same team (pro free speech, and against manipulation and other shenanigans of admins) as, I think, a literal nazi and a progressive... Sorry for this wall of text and my non-native English. I hope freedom of speech prevails - offline and online, if not here then at least on some other platform. See you, internet cowboys. ![](https://i.ibb.co/TvNKmDF/sad.gif)

post.body:
This is foxxx, continuing on from my previous post.

Now I will give more details on the RCP, as promised, including the immediate aftermath of my post, brigading and, of course, the recent mass siege.

https://ruqqus.com/+ShillWall/post/60wp/an-inside-look-at-the-rcp

As you may be aware, there was recently an attempt by users of the RCP to take and convert guilds for their own purposes after a certain user was banned. This is not entirely against the ToS - however, some of their practices during the event may be of note.

I will begin from the aftermath of my previous post and continue in the chronological order of the events which took place.

**The Immediate Aftermath**

![](https://cdn.discordapp.com/attachments/792420867475767316/792422049113047090/lol1_2.png)

As you can see, many users including the admin kek did not take my presence very seriously and began to joke about it. They believe I am harmless - in fact, they believe I am only helping to further help their agenda by creating paranoia for them.

![](https://cdn.discordapp.com/attachments/792420867475767316/792422115475324948/lol2_2.png)

Shortly after they joked around for a while, the server was deleted. This was primarily due to a separate factor and unrelated to my post. However, they soon set up a new server, RCP v2, which is now their base of operations and was used to orchestrate the mass siege. All of the following screenshots are from this server.

**A Period of Relative Inactivity**

![](https://cdn.discordapp.com/attachments/791699824201695255/792422834999263252/RCP9_2.png)

They briefly abstained from using @everyone for brigading after I posted. This may or may not be related to my presence, I would assume the latter but am unsure.

![](https://cdn.discordapp.com/attachments/791699824201695255/792422866586173461/RCP10_2.png)

Impersonation through the same method they use for guilds - changing the l to a capital i. This is followed up with the suggestion of conspiracy.

![](https://cdn.discordapp.com/attachments/791699824201695255/792422911642042368/RCP11_2.png)

![](https://cdn.discordapp.com/attachments/791699824201695255/792422962551849010/RCP12_2.png)

General malicious intent, stating they would like to "make life harder for faggots." The idea of using the ToS against their opponents, or having the admins change it to their liking, is implied.

![](https://cdn.discordapp.com/attachments/791699824201695255/792423029505916928/RCP13_2.png)

![](https://cdn.discordapp.com/attachments/791699824201695255/792423071944278027/RCP14_2.png)

Returning to the use of @everyone, including the start of the mass siege operation, which I will now detail and provide screenshots for.

**The Mass Siege Operation**

![](https://cdn.discordapp.com/attachments/791699824201695255/792423129980862494/RCP15_2.png)

The current server owner, Emerald41, listing off guilds to take over after the ban of JospehGoebbels. They used @everyone to notify the server of the imminent mass siege and pinned their list of guilds.

![](https://cdn.discordapp.com/attachments/791699824201695255/792423172888461373/RCP16_2.png)

Once again using a mass notification to coordinate the event, requesting users to take over two guilds in particular which had not yet been claimed.

![](https://cdn.discordapp.com/attachments/791699824201695255/792423226487734272/RCP17_2.png)

Yet again, another mass notification, informing all participants of a strategy to exile undesirable users quicker.

![](https://cdn.discordapp.com/attachments/791699824201695255/792423322990280794/RCP18_2.png)

![](https://cdn.discordapp.com/attachments/791699824201695255/792423359447171082/RCP19_2.png)

![](https://cdn.discordapp.com/attachments/791699824201695255/792423391436996618/RCP20_2.png)

The server owner was quick to celebrate the ongoing event with a cheery post in the announcement channel. They seem to be enjoying all of this. "Today, in RCP history..."

![](https://cdn.discordapp.com/attachments/791699824201695255/792423461883871232/RCP21_2.png)

![](https://cdn.discordapp.com/attachments/791699824201695255/792423587839213588/RCP22_2.png)

More strategies to enforce their agenda quicker.

![](https://cdn.discordapp.com/attachments/791699824201695255/792423647415500800/RCP23_2.png)

Again, using a technicality to ensure another guild is taken into the hands of the RCP, this time getting a friend outside of the RCP - and likely not a frequent user of this website either - to take the guild for them.

![](https://cdn.discordapp.com/attachments/791699824201695255/792423710375018516/RCP24_2.png)

![](https://cdn.discordapp.com/attachments/791699824201695255/792423781808865290/RCP25_2.png)

![](https://cdn.discordapp.com/attachments/791699824201695255/792423875992485888/RCP26_2.png)

![](https://cdn.discordapp.com/attachments/791699824201695255/792423973954519050/RCP28_2.png)

**Bonus I: Comic Relief**

As you likely suspect, certain users are attempting to discover my true identity and have created an entire channel for it - the channel list of which I will reveal in the next section.

![](https://cdn.discordapp.com/attachments/792420867475767316/792422167425056788/lol3_2.png)

As of now, they seem to believe the user Foxx's fuxxboy is behind this account due to his apparent obsession with me. It is oddly entertaining. However, despite their efforts, my true identity still eludes them.

![](https://cdn.discordapp.com/attachments/792420867475767316/792422272744030238/lol4_2.png)

Either way, they consider their server to still be nothing more than a joke and most are indifferent towards whether or not I am revealed.

**Bonus II: Additional Screenshots**

These will be screenshots which do not fit the other sections of this post, intended to further detail the new RCP server and other intentions of the group.

![](https://cdn.discordapp.com/attachments/791522109351264268/792391978775347200/RCP8_2.png)

Although this post was misread at the time, the intention behind it is clear as day - they actively seek to have undesirable users banned from the site.

![](https://cdn.discordapp.com/attachments/791522109351264268/791701631045468190/channel_list_2.png)

The list of primary channels from the new RCP server.

---

This is all for now. There is some additional material I wanted to post but I believe this should suffice for now - any material not posted here will more than likely make it into my next post instead.

Therefore the block only serves one purpose: so I can't reply back and give my side of the situation! His word will now be the final and only one from now on, and I assume he has done this because he's afraid of me exposing him and his discord shenanigans.

This happened right after he threatened to ban me from the site for dissenting a second time. Daddy spez would be proud. If I end up banned, we know the truth.

I've now blocked him back. Unfortunately he is an admin and can get around it, and I'm sure he will like he does with guild exiles. But it serves a symbolic purpose.
post.title: captainmeta4 blocked me so I can't reply to his posts (but he still replies to mine)
